pullRequest.title: Regenerate swagger classes, fix access and creation of models.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Updates swagger models.
Fixes creation of them.

commit.message: Adding QueueHelper to access internal methods.

nodes.bodyText: Is this going to be always not null entry.getContent() ? Could this throw NPE ?
Should we add some warning message here, in case of ClassCastException ?
Should we indicate what this object will contain , when user create/update rule what kind of information will come back ? Same comment for other similar return any object .

nodes.bodyText: Name change , Shouldn't this be EntitiesImpl  ?

commit.message: Move to use API version and remove QueueHelper parameter.
